content:
I can certainly do that. Here's the updated version in first person view:

It's important for me to determine my interview goals before recruiting and creating a representative sample of the target population. The article provides some ways for me to search for potential interview participants, such as using my personal networks, social media platforms, and online interest-based groups. I can also consider third-party research recruiting agencies and paid services as options to find interviewees. The passage concludes by suggesting that I reach out to participants through email and provides some tips on what to include in the message.
